sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"移居，迁移"之意。
means: emigrate ： 指自本国移出，长期定居在外。
immigrate ： 指自他国移入，长期定居。
migrate ： 通常指大批人短期或定期的移居。指动物时，则指定期迁徙、回游。

sentence.Network_en: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们为找工作而迁移到雅加达这类城市里。
燕子在冬天迁徙到南方。

sentence.Network_en: These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些鸟春天向北迁徙,秋天向南迁徙.

list.abs: 电动力法去除污染物的机制主要包括:电渗透 (electroosmotic);即土壤层中渗透水流动,离子迁移(ionic migration);即离子受电力而移动,藉由上述机制电动力法可清除或.
在TEM 下看到了明显的InAsN wetting layer 形貌,在高的长晶温度增强了氮的迁移长度(migration length)以及氮喜欢群聚的特性而形成了含氮量不均匀的InAsN 量子点.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the general sense 'move from one place to another'): from Latin migrat- 'moved, shifted', from the verb migrare

entry.tran: 移居，迁徙(尤指到外地寻找工作或暂住一段时间)
entry.def: If people migrate, they move from one place to another, especially in order to find work or to live somewhere for a short time.

example.ex: People migrate to cities like Jakarta in search of work...
example.tran: 人们为找工作而迁移到雅加达这类城市里。

example.ex: Farmers have learned that they have to migrate if they want to survive.
example.tran: 农民们已经认识到，想要生存就必须外出打工。

entry.tran: (鸟类、鱼类、兽类等随季节变化)迁徙
entry.def: When birds, fish, or animals migrate, they move at a particular season from one part of the world or from one part of a country to another, usually in order to breed or to find new feeding grounds.

example.ex: Most birds have to fly long distances to migrate.
example.tran: 绝大多数鸟类为了迁徙都不得不进行长距离的飞行。

example.ex: ...a dam system that kills the fish as they migrate from streams to the ocean.
example.tran: 导致鱼类在从溪流向海洋迁徙途中死亡的水坝体系

means.word_mean: 1. move from one country or region to another and settle there;

sentences.sentence: "Many Germans migrated to South America in the mid-19th century"
"This tribe transmigrated many times over the centuries"
"The worker migrate to where the crops need harvesting"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+migr迁移+ant……的→adj.移来的,移民的
migrate[v.迁移,移居[国外]]+ory……的→adj.迁移的,流浪的
e出+migr迁移+ant人→n.移居外国者, 移民

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移民出境, 侨居, [总称]移民
stems_affixes.word_buile: emigrate自本国移居他乡+ion动作或状态→emigration移民出境

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移居者[尤指因政治因素而移居外国者],流亡者
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+migr移+e→n.移居者[尤指因政治因素而移居外国者],流亡者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外来的移民, 移居入境
stems_affixes.word_buile: immigrate移居入境+ion动作或状态→immigration移居入境
migr迁移+ant人或物→迁移的鸟→候鸟

stems_affixes.value_cn: 移民, 移植, 移往, 移动
stems_affixes.word_buile: migrate迁移,移居+ion动作或状态→migration移民;移往
trans变换+migrate[v.迁移,移居[国外]]→v.[宗]轮回, 移居

Sentence.sentence: Comedy and drama shows ("Jack Benny," "Amos and Andy," "The Shadow") all migrated to television.

sentences.en: Pioneers from New England migrated to all parts of the United States.
sentences.cn: 来自新英格兰的拓荒者移居到美国各地。

sentences.en: These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟春天向北迁徙, 秋天向南迁徙。

jushi.english: These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.
jushi.chinese: 这些鸟春天向北迁徙,秋天向南迁徙。

jushi.english: Pioneers from New England migrated to all parts of the United States.
jushi.chinese: 来自新英格兰的拓荒者移居到美国各地。

jushi.english: At the end of the summer these birds migrate from Canada to South America.
jushi.chinese: 在夏末,这些鸟从加拿大迁徙到南美。
